Driver for display type ssd1306 write in Nim. This module offers you basic methods to simply manage the ssd1306 display

Imports

frameBuffer

Types

SSD1306I2C = ref object of Framebuffer
  i2c: I2cInst
  lcdAdd: uint8
  pages: int
  externalVcc: bool
  temp: array[0 .. 1, byte]

Consts

ssd1306Ver = "0.7.2"

Procs

proc contrast(self: SSD1306I2C; contrast: uint8) {....raises: [], tags: [].}
DA VEDERE QUESTA::: 
proc invert(self: SSD1306I2C; invert: uint8) {....raises: [], tags: [].}
proc newSsd1306I2C(i2c: I2cInst; lcdAdd: uint8; width, height: int;
                   externalVcc = false): SSD1306I2C {....raises: [Exception],
    tags: [RootEffect].}
Display initiator

Example:

newSsd1306I2C(i2c=i2c1, lcdAdd=0x3C, width=128, height=64)
Parameters:
  • i2c = name of the block where the display connected (i2c0 or i2c1).
  • lcdAdd = hardware address of the display.
  • width = display width (see data scheet).
  • height = display height (see data sheet).
proc powerOff(self: SSD1306I2C) {....raises: [], tags: [].}

proc show(self: SSD1306I2C) {....raises: [], tags: [].}
shows what is written in memory by the procedures that trace forms or characters (otherwise they are not displayed).

Example:

show()
